Translated by Tripiá¹­aka Master Xuanzang on Imperial Order
Chapter 19, Part 4: Contemplation Practice, in the First Part
At that time, ÅšÄriputra asked SubhÅ«ti,
Why do you say that if form, etc. are not produced, then they are not form, etc.?
Form is empty in the nature of form. In this emptiness, there is no production and no form;

Feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness are empty in the nature of feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness. In this emptiness, there is no production and no feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness.
If form is not produced, then it is not form. If feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness are not produced, then they are not feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness.
The eye sense base is empty in the nature of the eye sense base. In this emptiness, there is no production and no eye sense base;

the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind sense fields are the emptiness of the nature of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind sense fields, and in this emptiness there is no arising of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind sense fields.

the eye sense field that does not arise is not the eye sense field, and the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind sense fields that do not arise are not the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind sense fields.
the form sense field is the emptiness of the nature of the form sense field, and in this emptiness there is no arising of the form sense field;

the sound, smell, taste, touch, and mental objects are the emptiness of the nature of the sound, smell, taste, touch, and mental objects sense fields, and in this emptiness there is no arising of the sound, smell, taste, touch, and mental objects sense fields.

the non-arising of the sense field of form is not the sense field of form, the non-arising of the sense fields of sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharmas is not the sense fields of sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharmas.
The eye element, the eye element's nature is empty, in this emptiness there is no arising, no eye element;

the form element, eye consciousness element, and eye contact, and the various feelings produced from eye contact as a condition, the form element up to the various feelings produced from eye contact as a condition have the nature of emptiness, in this emptiness there is no arising, no form element up to the various feelings produced from eye contact as a condition.

the non-arising of the eye element is not the eye element, the non-arising of the form element up to the various feelings produced from eye contact as a condition is not the form element up to the various feelings produced from eye contact as a condition.
The ear element, the ear element's nature is empty, in this emptiness there is no arising, no ear element;

the sound element, the ear-consciousness element, and the ear-contact, and whatever feelings arise from the condition of ear-contact, the sound element up to the ear-contact as a condition and the arising of feelings are all empty of inherent nature. In this emptiness, there is no arising of the sound element up to the ear-contact as a condition and the arising of feelings.

The ear element is unborn and is not the ear element, the sound element up to the ear-contact as a condition and the arising of feelings are unborn and are not the sound element up to the ear-contact as a condition and the arising of feelings.
The nose element, the nose element is empty of inherent nature. In this emptiness, there is no arising of the nose element;

the smell element, the nose-consciousness element, and the nose-contact, and whatever feelings arise from the condition of nose-contact, the smell element up to the nose-contact as a condition and the arising of feelings are all empty of inherent nature. In this emptiness, there is no arising of the smell element up to the nose-contact as a condition and the arising of feelings.

The nose-field, if not produced, is not the nose-field, and the smell-field up to the nose-contact as condition-produced feeling, if not produced, is not the smell-field up to the nose-contact as condition-produced feeling.
The tongue-field, the tongue-field is empty of intrinsic nature. In this intrinsic nature, there is no production and no tongue-field;

The taste-field, the tongue-consciousness-field, and the tongue-contact, the tongue-contact as condition-produced feeling, the taste-field up to the tongue-contact as condition-produced feeling are empty of intrinsic nature. In this intrinsic nature, there is no production and no taste-field up to the tongue-contact as condition-produced feeling.

The tongue-field, if not produced, is not the tongue-field, and the taste-field up to the tongue-contact as condition-produced feeling, if not produced, is not the taste-field up to the tongue-contact as condition-produced feeling.
the body element and the nature of the body element are empty, in this emptiness there is no arising and no body element;

the touch element, the body consciousness element, and the body contact, the various feelings that arise from the condition of body contact, the nature of the touch element up to the various feelings that arise from the condition of body contact are empty, in this emptiness there is no arising and no touch element up to the various feelings that arise from the condition of body contact.

the body element not arising is not the body element, the touch element up to the various feelings that arise from the condition of body contact not arising are not the touch element up to the various feelings that arise from the condition of body contact.
the mind element and the nature of the mind element are empty, in this emptiness there is no arising and no mind element;

the dharma realm, the mental consciousness realm, and mental contact, and the feelings produced from the condition of mental contact up to the dharma realm and the feelings produced from the condition of mental contact are empty of inherent nature. In this emptiness of inherent nature, there is no arising and no dharma realm up to the feelings produced from the condition of mental contact.

the eye realm not arising is not the eye realm, the form realm up to the eye contact and the feelings produced from the condition of eye contact not arising are not the form realm up to the feelings produced from the condition of eye contact.
the earth element, the earth element's nature is empty. In this emptiness there is no arising and no earth element;

the water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness elements, the water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness elements' natures are empty. In this emptiness there is no arising and no water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness elements.
The earth element, not arising, is not the earth element. The water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness elements, not arising, are not the water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness elements.
The noble truth of suffering, the noble truth of suffering is empty by nature. In this emptiness, there is no arising and no noble truth of suffering;

The noble truths of the accumulation of suffering, the cessation of suffering, and the path, the noble truths of the accumulation of suffering, the cessation of suffering, and the path are empty by nature. In this emptiness, there is no arising and no noble truths of the accumulation of suffering, the cessation of suffering, and the path.

The noble truth of suffering, not arising, is not the noble truth of suffering. The noble truths of the accumulation of suffering, the cessation of suffering, and the path, not arising, are not the noble truths of the accumulation of suffering, the cessation of suffering, and the path.
Ignorance, the nature of ignorance is empty. In this emptiness, there is no arising and no ignorance;

the nature of formations up to old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, and distress is empty, and in this emptiness there is no arising, no formations up to old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, and distress.

If ignorance does not arise, it is not ignorance, and if formations up to old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, and distress do not arise, they are not formations up to old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, and distress.
The nature of internal emptiness is empty, and in this emptiness there is no arising of internal emptiness;

external emptiness, internal and external emptiness, emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, emptiness of conditioned phenomena, emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, absolute emptiness, emptiness without beginning or end, emptiness of non-dispersal, emptiness of inherent existence, emptiness of intrinsic nature, emptiness of specific characteristics, emptiness of all phenomena, emptiness of non-apprehension, emptiness of nature, emptiness of intrinsic nature, emptiness of the intrinsic nature of non-existence. In this emptiness of intrinsic nature, there is no arising of external emptiness up to the emptiness of the intrinsic nature of non-existence.

The non-arising of internal emptiness is not internal emptiness, and the non-arising of external emptiness up to the emptiness of the intrinsic nature of non-existence is not external emptiness up to the emptiness of the intrinsic nature of non-existence.
The perfection of generosity is empty of the intrinsic nature of the perfection of generosity. In this emptiness, there is no arising of the perfection of generosity;

The nature of the perfections of morality, patience, diligence, concentration, and wisdom is empty, and in this emptiness there is no arising and no morality, patience, diligence, concentration, and wisdom.

The non-arising of the perfection of generosity is not the perfection of generosity, and the non-arising of the perfections of morality, patience, diligence, concentration, and wisdom are not the perfections of morality, patience, diligence, concentration, and wisdom.
The four concentrations are empty of the nature of the four concentrations, and in this emptiness there is no arising and no four concentrations;

the four immeasurables and the four formless concentrations are empty of inherent nature, and in this emptiness of inherent nature there is no arising of the four immeasurables and the four formless concentrations.

the four meditations not arising are not the four meditations, and the four immeasurables and the four formless concentrations not arising are not the four immeasurables and the four formless concentrations.
the eight liberations are empty of the inherent nature of the eight liberations, and in this emptiness there is no arising of the eight liberations;

the eight perfect penetrations, the nine sequential attainments, and the ten universal bases are empty of the inherent nature of the eight perfect penetrations, the nine sequential attainments, and the ten universal bases, and in this emptiness there is no arising of the eight perfect penetrations, the nine sequential attainments, and the ten universal bases.

The eight liberations not arising are not the eight liberations, the eight superior realms, the nine sequential attainments, and the ten universal bases not arising are not the eight superior realms, the nine sequential attainments, and the ten universal bases.
The four establishments of mindfulness are empty of the nature of the four establishments of mindfulness, in this emptiness there is no arising and no four establishments of mindfulness;

the four right efforts, four bases of supernatural power, five faculties, five powers, seven factors of enlightenment, and eightfold noble path are empty of the nature of the four right efforts up to the eightfold noble path, in this emptiness there is no arising and no four right efforts up to eightfold noble path.

The four establishments of mindfulness not arising are not the four establishments of mindfulness, the four right efforts up to the eightfold noble path not arising are not the four right efforts up to the eightfold noble path.
The emptiness of the gate of emptiness is empty of the nature of the gate of emptiness, and in this emptiness there is no arising or emptiness of the gate of emptiness;

The signlessness and wishlessness of the gate of signlessness and wishlessness are empty of the nature of the gate of signlessness and wishlessness, and in this emptiness there is no arising or signlessness and wishlessness of the gate of signlessness and wishlessness.
The non-arising of the gate of emptiness is not the gate of emptiness, and the non-arising of the gate of signlessness and wishlessness is not the gate of signlessness and wishlessness.
The five eyes are empty of the nature of the five eyes, and in this emptiness there is no arising or five eyes;
The six supernormal knowledges are empty of the nature of the six supernormal knowledges, and in this emptiness there is no arising or six supernormal knowledges.
The non-arising of the five eyes is not the five eyes, and the non-arising of the six supernormal knowledges is not the six supernormal knowledges.
the ten powers of the Buddha are empty of the intrinsic nature of the ten powers, and in this emptiness there is no arising or Buddha's ten powers;

the four fearlessnesses, the four unobstructed understandings, great kindness, great compassion, great joy, great equanimity, and the eighteen distinctive abilities of the Buddha are empty of the intrinsic nature of the four fearlessnesses up to the eighteen distinctive abilities of the Buddha, and in this emptiness there is no arising or four fearlessnesses up to the eighteen distinctive abilities of the Buddha.

the non-arising of the ten powers of the Buddha is not the ten powers of the Buddha, and the non-arising of the four fearlessnesses up to the eighteen distinctive abilities of the Buddha is not the four fearlessnesses up to the eighteen distinctive abilities of the Buddha.
suchness is empty of the intrinsic nature of suchness, and in this emptiness there is no arising or suchness;

the dharma realm, dharma nature, equality nature, detachment nature, dharma determination, dharma abiding, ultimate reality, space realm, and inconceivable realm are empty of the nature of the dharma realm up to the inconceivable realm. In this emptiness, there is no arising and no dharma realm up to the inconceivable realm.
Suchness that is not produced is not suchness, and the dharma realm up to the inconceivable realm that is not produced is not the dharma realm up to the inconceivable realm.
Unsurpassed perfect enlightenment is empty of the nature of unsurpassed perfect enlightenment. In this emptiness, there is no arising and no unsurpassed perfect enlightenment;

All-knowledge, knowledge of path aspects, and knowledge of all aspects are empty of the nature of all-knowledge, knowledge of path aspects, and knowledge of all aspects. In this emptiness, there is no arising and no all-knowledge, knowledge of path aspects, and knowledge of all aspects.

Unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, if not arisen, is not unsurpassed perfect enlightenment; the cognition of all aspects, the cognition of the path, and the cognition of all objects, if not arisen, are not the cognition of all aspects, the cognition of the path, and the cognition of all objects.
The dharma of non-forgetfulness is empty of the nature of the dharma of non-forgetfulness, and in this emptiness there is no arising of the dharma of non-forgetfulness;
The nature of constant abiding in equanimity is empty of the nature of constant abiding in equanimity, and in this emptiness there is no arising of constant abiding in equanimity.
The dharma of non-forgetfulness, if not arisen, is not the dharma of non-forgetfulness; constant abiding in equanimity, if not arisen, is not constant abiding in equanimity.
All dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gateways are empty of the nature of all dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gateways, and in this emptiness there is no arising of all dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gateways;

all the doors of concentration are empty of the intrinsic nature of all the doors of concentration, and in this intrinsic nature of emptiness there is no arising and no all the doors of concentration.
all dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gateways that are non-arising are not all dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gateways, and all doors of concentration that are non-arising are not all doors of concentration.
At that time, ÅšÄriputra asked SubhÅ«ti, saying:
For what reason do you say that form, etc. that is non-extinguished is not form, etc.?
Form is empty of the intrinsic nature of form, and in this intrinsic nature of emptiness there is no extinguishing and no form;

feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness are empty of the intrinsic nature of feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness, and in this intrinsic nature of emptiness there is no extinguishing and no feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness.
Form, when not extinguished, is not form. Feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness, when not extinguished, are not feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness.
The eye sense base is empty of the intrinsic nature of the eye sense base. In this intrinsic nature, there is no extinction and no eye sense base;

The ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind sense bases are empty of the intrinsic nature of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind sense bases. In this intrinsic nature, there is no extinction and no ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind sense bases.

The eye sense base, when not extinguished, is not the eye sense base. The ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind sense bases, when not extinguished, are not the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind sense bases.
The form sense base is empty of the intrinsic nature of the form sense base. In this intrinsic nature, there is no extinction and no form sense base;
the nature of the faculties of sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharmas is empty, and in this emptiness there is no cessation of the faculties of sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharmas.

the cessation of the sense field of sights is not the sense field of sights, the cessation of the sense fields of sounds, smells, tastes, touches, and dharmas is not the sense fields of sounds, smells, tastes, touches, and dharmas.
the eye sense field is empty of the nature of the eye sense field, and in this emptiness there is no cessation of the eye sense field;

the sense fields of sights, eye consciousness, and eye contact, and the various feelings that arise from eye contact as a condition are empty of the nature of the sense fields of sights, eye consciousness, and eye contact, and the various feelings that arise from eye contact as a condition, and in this emptiness there is no cessation of the sense fields of sights, eye consciousness, and eye contact, and the various feelings that arise from eye contact as a condition.

the eye element is non-extinction, then it is not the eye element; the form element up to the eye-contact as condition are non-extinction, then they are not the form element up to the eye-contact as condition.
The ear element, the ear element's nature is empty, in this emptiness there is no extinction, no ear element;

the sound element, the ear-consciousness element and the ear-contact, the ear-contact as condition for the arising of feelings, the sound element up to the ear-contact as condition for the arising of feelings are empty, in this emptiness there is no extinction, no sound element up to the ear-contact as condition for the arising of feelings.

the ear element is non-extinction, then it is not the ear element; the sound element up to the ear-contact as condition for the arising of feelings are non-extinction, then they are not the sound element up to the ear-contact as condition for the arising of feelings.
The nose element, the nose element's nature is empty, in this emptiness there is no extinction, no nose element;

the olfactory world, the olfactory consciousness world, and olfactory contact, as well as what arises due to olfactory contact, such as feelings, the olfactory world up to olfactory contact as a condition, and what arises due to olfactory contact, such as feelings, are empty of inherent nature. In this emptiness of inherent nature, there is no cessation, no olfactory world up to olfactory contact as a condition, and no what arises due to olfactory contact, such as feelings.

The nose world does not cease, then it is not the nose world; the olfactory world up to olfactory contact as a condition, and what arises due to olfactory contact, such as feelings, do not cease, then they are not the olfactory world up to olfactory contact as a condition, and what arises due to olfactory contact, such as feelings.
The tongue world, the tongue world is empty of inherent nature. In this emptiness of inherent nature, there is no cessation, no tongue world;

the flavor world, the gustatory consciousness world, and gustatory contact, as well as what arises due to gustatory contact, such as feelings, the flavor world up to gustatory contact as a condition, and what arises due to gustatory contact, such as feelings, are empty of inherent nature. In this emptiness of inherent nature, there is no cessation, no flavor world up to gustatory contact as a condition, and no what arises due to gustatory contact, such as feelings.

The tongue element, if it were not to cease, would not be the tongue element; the taste element, up to the tongue contact that is the basis for the production of feelings would not be the taste element, up to the tongue contact that is the basis for the production of feelings.
The body element, the body element is empty of intrinsic nature. In this emptiness, there is no cessation of the body element;

The touch element, the body consciousness element, and the body contact, the body contact that is the basis for the production of feelings, the touch element up to the body contact that is the basis for the production of feelings are empty of intrinsic nature. In this emptiness, there is no cessation of the touch element up to the body contact that is the basis for the production of feelings.

The body element, if it were not to cease, would not be the body element; the touch element up to the body contact that is the basis for the production of feelings would not be the touch element up to the body contact that is the basis for the production of feelings.
the mind realm is empty of the nature of the mind realm, and in this emptiness there is no cessation, no mind realm;

the dharma realm, mental consciousness realm, and mental contact, and the various feelings that arise from mental contact as a condition, up to the dharma realm and the various feelings that arise from mental contact as a condition are empty of the nature of the dharma realm and the various feelings that arise from mental contact as a condition, and in this emptiness there is no cessation, no dharma realm and the various feelings that arise from mental contact as a condition.

the non-cessation of the mind realm is not the mind realm, and the non-cessation of the dharma realm and the various feelings that arise from mental contact as a condition, up to the dharma realm and the various feelings that arise from mental contact as a condition are not the dharma realm and the various feelings that arise from mental contact as a condition.
the earth element is empty of the nature of the earth element, and in this emptiness there is no cessation, no earth element;

the water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness elements are empty of the nature of the water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness elements, and in this emptiness there is no cessation, no water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness elements.

The earth element, if not extinguished, is not the earth element; the water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness elements, if not extinguished, are not the water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness elements.
The noble truth of suffering, the noble truth of suffering is empty of intrinsic nature. In this intrinsic emptiness, there is no extinction and no noble truth of suffering;

The noble truths of the origin, cessation, and path, the noble truths of the origin, cessation, and path are empty of intrinsic nature. In this intrinsic emptiness, there is no extinction and no noble truths of the origin, cessation, and path.

The noble truth of suffering, if not extinguished, is not the noble truth of suffering; the noble truths of the origin, cessation, and path, if not extinguished, are not the noble truths of the origin, cessation, and path.
Ignorance, the nature of ignorance is empty. In this emptiness, there is no extinction and no ignorance;

the nature of formations up to old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, and distress is empty, and in this emptiness there is no cessation, no formations up to old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, and distress.

ignorance not ceasing is not ignorance, formations up to old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, and distress not ceasing are not formations up to old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, and distress.
inner emptiness, the nature of inner emptiness is empty, in this emptiness there is no cessation, no inner emptiness;

external emptiness, internal and external emptiness, emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, emptiness of conditioned phenomena, emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, absolute emptiness, emptiness without beginning or end, emptiness of non-dispersal, emptiness of inherent existence, emptiness of intrinsic nature, emptiness of specific characteristics, emptiness of all phenomena, emptiness of non-apprehension, emptiness of nature, emptiness of intrinsic nature, emptiness of the intrinsic nature of non-existence. In this emptiness of intrinsic nature, there is no cessation of external emptiness up to the emptiness of the intrinsic nature of non-existence.

The non-cessation of internal emptiness is not internal emptiness, and the non-cessation of external emptiness up to the emptiness of the intrinsic nature of non-existence is not external emptiness up to the emptiness of the intrinsic nature of non-existence.
The emptiness of the nature of the perfection of generosity is the perfection of generosity, in this emptiness there is no cessation of the perfection of generosity;

The nature of the perfections of morality, patience, diligence, concentration, and wisdom is empty, and in this emptiness there is no extinction or purification of the perfections of morality, patience, diligence, concentration, and wisdom.

The non-extinction of the perfection of generosity is not the perfection of generosity, and the non-extinction of the perfections of morality, patience, diligence, concentration, and wisdom is not the perfections of morality, patience, diligence, concentration, and wisdom.
The four concentrations are empty of the nature of the four concentrations, and in this emptiness there is no extinction of the four concentrations;

the four immeasurables and the four formless concentrations are empty of inherent nature, and in this emptiness of inherent nature there is no cessation, no four immeasurables and four formless concentrations.

the four dhyÄnas are not extinguished, then they are not the four dhyÄnas; the four immeasurables and the four formless concentrations are not extinguished, then they are not the four immeasurables and four formless concentrations.
the eight liberations are empty of the inherent nature of the eight liberations, and in this emptiness there is no cessation, no eight liberations;

the eight perfect penetrations, the nine sequential attainments, and the ten universal bases are empty of the inherent nature of the eight perfect penetrations, the nine sequential attainments, and the ten universal bases, and in this emptiness there is no cessation, no eight perfect penetrations, the nine sequential attainments, and the ten universal bases.

the eight liberations are not extinguished, then they are not the eight liberations; the eight spheres of mastery, the nine successive concentrations, and the ten universal bases are not extinguished, then they are not the eight spheres of mastery, the nine successive concentrations, and the ten universal bases.
The four establishments of mindfulness are empty of the nature of the four establishments of mindfulness, and in this emptiness there is no extinction and no four establishments of mindfulness;

the four right efforts, the four bases of supernatural power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven factors of enlightenment, and the eightfold noble path are empty of the nature of the four right efforts up to the eightfold noble path, and in this emptiness there is no extinction and no four right efforts up to the eightfold noble path.

the four establishments of mindfulness are not extinguished, then they are not the four establishments of mindfulness; the four right efforts up to the eightfold noble path are not extinguished, then they are not the four right efforts up to the eightfold noble path.
The emptiness of the gate of emptiness is empty of the nature of the gate of emptiness, and in this emptiness there is no extinction and no gate of emptiness;

The signlessness and wishlessness of the gate of signlessness and wishlessness are empty of the nature of signlessness and wishlessness, and in this emptiness there is no extinction and no gate of signlessness and wishlessness.
The non-extinction of the gate of emptiness is not the gate of emptiness, and the non-extinction of the gate of signlessness and wishlessness is not the gate of signlessness and wishlessness.
The five eyes are empty of the nature of the five eyes, and in this emptiness there is no extinction and no five eyes;
The six supernormal powers are empty of the nature of the six supernormal powers, and in this emptiness there is no extinction and no six supernormal powers.
The non-extinction of the five eyes is not the five eyes, and the non-extinction of the six supernormal powers is not the six supernormal powers.
the ten powers of the Buddha are empty of the intrinsic nature of the ten powers, and in this emptiness there is no extinction or Buddha's ten powers;

the four fearlessnesses, the four unobstructed understandings, great kindness, great compassion, great joy, great equanimity, and the eighteen distinctive abilities of the Buddha are empty of the intrinsic nature of the four fearlessnesses up to the eighteen distinctive abilities of the Buddha, and in this emptiness there is no extinction or four fearlessnesses up to the eighteen distinctive abilities of the Buddha.

the ten powers of the Buddha are not extinguished, and therefore they are not the ten powers of the Buddha; the four fearlessnesses up to the eighteen distinctive abilities of the Buddha are not extinguished, and therefore they are not the four fearlessnesses up to the eighteen distinctive abilities of the Buddha.
suchness is empty of the intrinsic nature of suchness, and in this emptiness there is no extinction or suchness;

the dharma realm, dharma nature, equality nature, detachment nature, dharma determination, dharma abiding, reality limit, space element, and inconceivable element are empty of the nature of the dharma realm up to the inconceivable element. In this emptiness there is no cessation, no dharma realm up to inconceivable element.
Suchness that does not cease is not suchness, the dharma realm up to the inconceivable element that does not cease is not the dharma realm up to the inconceivable element.
Unsurpassed perfect enlightenment is empty of the nature of unsurpassed perfect enlightenment. In this emptiness there is no cessation, no unsurpassed perfect enlightenment;

all-knowledge, knowledge of path aspects, and knowledge of all aspects are empty of the nature of all-knowledge, knowledge of path aspects, and knowledge of all aspects. In this emptiness there is no cessation, no all-knowledge, knowledge of path aspects, and knowledge of all aspects.

If unsurpassed perfect enlightenment is not extinguished, then it is not unsurpassed perfect enlightenment. If omniscience, the cognition of the path, and the cognition of all aspects are not extinguished, then they are not omniscience, the cognition of the path, and the cognition of all aspects.
The Dharma of non-forgetfulness is empty of the nature of the Dharma of non-forgetfulness. In this emptiness there is no extinction and no Dharma of non-forgetfulness;
The nature of constant abiding in relinquishment is empty of the nature of constant abiding in relinquishment. In this emptiness there is no extinction and no constant abiding in relinquishment.

If the Dharma of non-forgetfulness is not extinguished, then it is not the Dharma of non-forgetfulness. If constant abiding in relinquishment is not extinguished, then it is not constant abiding in relinquishment.
All dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gateways are empty of the nature of all dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gateways. In this emptiness there is no extinction and no all dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gateways;
all the doors of concentration are empty of the nature of the doors of concentration, and in this emptiness there is no cessation, no doors of concentration.
all dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gateways are not extinguished, then they are not all dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gateways; all doors of concentration are not extinguished, then they are not all doors of concentration.
At that time, ÅšÄriputra asked SubhÅ«ti, saying:
Why do you say that form, etc., which is not dual, is not form, etc.?

Whether it is form or non-duality, whether it is feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness, or non-duality, all of these are neither associated nor not associated, neither having form nor formless, neither visible nor invisible, neither obstructing nor unobstructing, all having the same single mark, which is to say, the mark of no mark.
Form, not being two, is not form. Feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness, not being two, are not feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness.

If the eye sense field and non-duality, the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind sense fields and non-duality, all of these are neither associated nor not associated, neither having form nor formless, neither visible nor invisible, neither obstructing nor unobstructing, all having the same single mark, which is to say, the mark of the absence of marks.
The eye sense field, not being two, is not the eye sense field. The ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind sense fields, not being two, are not the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind sense fields.

Whether it is the sphere of form or non-duality, whether it is the sphere of sound, smell, taste, touch, or dharmas or non-duality, all of these are neither associated nor not associated, neither having form nor formless, neither visible nor invisible, neither obstructing nor unobstructing, all sharing the same single characteristic, which is to say, the characteristic of absence.
The non-duality of the sphere of form is not the sphere of form, the non-duality of the sphere of sound, smell, taste, touch, or dharmas is not the sphere of sound, smell, taste, touch, or dharmas.

Whether it is the eye element or non-duality, whether it is the form element, eye consciousness element, and eye contact, or the various feelings produced by the condition of eye contact or non-duality, all of these are neither associated nor not associated, neither having form nor formless, neither visible nor invisible, neither obstructing nor unobstructing, all sharing the same single characteristic, which is to say, the characteristic of absence.

The eye element is non-dual, thus it is not the eye element; the form element up to the eye contact as condition produced feelings are non-dual, thus they are not the form element up to the eye contact as condition produced feelings.

If the ear element is non-dual, if the sound element, ear consciousness element and ear contact, and feelings produced from the condition of ear contact are non-dual, then all of these are neither associated nor not associated, neither having form nor formless, neither visible nor invisible, neither obstructing nor unobstructing, all having the same single mark, which is to say, the mark of no mark.

The ear element is non-dual, thus it is not the ear element; the sound element up to the feelings produced from the condition of ear contact are non-dual, thus they are not the sound element up to the feelings produced from the condition of ear contact.

whether the nose realm is non-dual, or the nose consciousness realm and nose contact, and the various feelings produced by nose contact as a condition are non-dual, all of these are neither associated nor not associated, neither having form nor formless, neither visible nor invisible, neither obstructing nor unobstructing, all having the same single mark, which is to say, the mark of the absence of marks.

the nose realm is non-dual, then it is not the nose realm, the nose consciousness realm and nose contact, and the various feelings produced by nose contact as a condition are non-dual, then they are not the various feelings produced by nose contact as a condition.

Whether it is the tongue element or non-duality, whether it is the taste element, tongue consciousness element, and tongue contact, or the various feelings produced by tongue contact as a condition, all of these are neither associated nor not associated, neither having form nor formless, neither visible nor invisible, neither obstructing nor unobstructing, all sharing the same single characteristic, which is to say, the characteristic of absence.

The tongue element, being non-dual, is not the tongue element; the taste element, up to the various feelings produced by tongue contact as a condition, being non-dual, are not the taste element, up to the various feelings produced by tongue contact as a condition.

whether the body element or non-duality, whether the tactile object element, body consciousness element, body contact, or bodily pleasant or painful or neutral feeling arising from contact with the body, all are neither associated nor not associated, neither form nor formless, neither visible nor invisible, neither obstructing nor unobstructing, all are of one mark, namely, the mark of no mark.

The body element is non-dual, therefore it is not the body element; the tactile object element up to the bodily pleasant or painful or neutral feeling arising from contact with the body is non-dual, therefore it is not the tactile object element up to the bodily pleasant or painful or neutral feeling arising from contact with the body.

Whether it is the mind-sphere or non-duality, the dharma-sphere, mind-consciousness-sphere, and mind-contact, and the feelings produced from the condition of mind-contact are non-dual. In this way, all are neither associated nor not associated, neither having form nor formless, neither visible nor invisible, neither obstructing nor unobstructing, all having the same single mark, which is to say, the mark of absence.

The mind-sphere is non-dual, thus it is not the mind-sphere. The dharma-sphere up to the feelings produced from the condition of mind-contact are non-dual, thus they are not the dharma-sphere up to the feelings produced from the condition of mind-contact.

Whether it is the earth element or non-duality, whether it is the water, fire, wind, space, or consciousness elements or non-duality, all of these are neither associated nor not associated, neither having form nor formless, neither visible nor invisible, neither obstructing nor unobstructing, all sharing the same single characteristic, which is to say, the characteristic of absence.
The earth element, as non-dual, is not the earth element; the water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness elements, as non-dual, are not the water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness elements.

Whether it is the noble truth of suffering or non-duality, whether it is the noble truths of the accumulation, cessation, or path, as non-duality, all of these are neither associated nor not associated, neither having form nor formless, neither visible nor invisible, neither obstructing nor unobstructing, all sharing the same single characteristic, which is to say, the characteristic of absence.

The noble truth of suffering is not two, and thus it is not the noble truth of suffering. The noble truths of the accumulation of suffering, the cessation of suffering, and the path are not two, and thus they are not the noble truths of the accumulation of suffering, the cessation of suffering, and the path.

If ignorance is not two, and if the formative predispositions, consciousness, name-and-form, the six sense fields, contact, feeling, craving, grasping, existence, birth, and old age and death are not two, then all of these are neither associated nor not associated, neither having form nor formless, neither visible nor invisible, neither obstructing nor unobstructing, and all have the same single mark, which is to say, they are without marks.
Ignorance is not two, and thus it is not ignorance. The formative predispositions up to old age and death are not two, and thus they are not the formative predispositions up to old age and death.

Whether it is internal emptiness or non-duality, whether it is external emptiness, internal and external emptiness, emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, emptiness of the ultimate, emptiness of the conditioned, emptiness of the unconditioned, absolute emptiness, emptiness without beginning or end, emptiness of dispersion, emptiness of immutability, emptiness of inherent nature, emptiness of specific characteristics, emptiness of common characteristics, emptiness of all phenomena, emptiness of non-attainment, emptiness of nature, emptiness of self-nature, or emptiness of the nature of self-nature, all of these are neither associated nor unassociated, neither having form nor formless, neither visible nor invisible, neither having resistance nor without resistance, all having the same characteristic, which is to say, the characteristic of absence.

Internal emptiness is not non-dual, and therefore it is not internal emptiness. External emptiness up to the emptiness of the nature of self-nature is not non-dual, and therefore it is not external emptiness up to the emptiness of the nature of self-nature.

If the perfection of giving and non-duality, if the perfection of morality, patience, diligence, meditation, and wisdom and non-duality, all of these are neither associated nor not associated, neither having form nor formless, neither visible nor invisible, neither obstructing nor unobstructing, all have the same single mark, which is to say, the mark of no mark.

The perfection of giving, which is non-dual, is not the perfection of giving, the perfection of morality, patience, diligence, meditation, and wisdom, which are non-dual, are not the perfection of morality, patience, diligence, meditation, and wisdom.

whether the four formless concentrations are two or not, all of these are neither associated nor not associated, neither have form nor are formless, neither are visible nor are invisible, neither are obstructed nor are unobstructed, and are all of one mark, which is to say, they are markless.
the four formless concentrations, if not two, are not the four formless concentrations, the four formless concentrations, if not not two, are not the four formless concentrations.

whether the eight liberations are two or not, whether the eight superior realms, nine sequential attainments, and ten universal bases are two or not, all of these are neither associated nor not associated, neither have form nor are formless, neither are visible nor are invisible, neither are obstructed nor are unobstructed, and are all of one mark, which is to say, they are markless.

The eight liberations, not two, are not the eight liberations, the eight spheres of mastery, the nine successive concentrations, and the ten universal bases, not two, are not the eight spheres of mastery, the nine successive concentrations, and the ten universal bases.

If the four establishments of mindfulness and non-duality, if the four right efforts, four bases of supernatural power, five faculties, five powers, seven factors of enlightenment, and eightfold noble path and non-duality, all of these are neither associated nor not associated, neither having form nor formless, neither visible nor invisible, neither obstructing nor unobstructing, all share the same characteristic, which is to say, the characteristic of absence.

The four establishments of mindfulness, not two, are not the four establishments of mindfulness, the four right efforts up to the eightfold noble path, not two, are not the four right efforts up to the eightfold noble path.

Whether it is the gate of liberation of emptiness or non-duality, whether it is the gate of liberation of signlessness or wishlessness or non-duality, all of these are neither associated nor not associated, neither having form nor formless, neither visible nor invisible, neither obstructing nor unobstructing, all sharing the same single characteristic, which is to say, the characteristic of signlessness.

The gate of liberation of emptiness, which is non-dual, is not the gate of liberation of emptiness. The gate of liberation of signlessness or wishlessness, which is non-dual, is not the gate of liberation of signlessness or wishlessness.

Whether it is the five eyes or non-duality, whether it is the six supernormal knowledges or non-duality, all of these are neither associated nor not associated, neither having form nor formless, neither visible nor invisible, neither obstructing nor unobstructing, all sharing the same single characteristic, which is to say, the characteristic of signlessness.
The non-duality of the five eyes is not the five eyes, and the non-duality of the six supernormal powers is not the six supernormal powers.

If the ten powers of a buddha are non-dual, and if the four forms of fearlessness, the four unobstructed understandings, great kindness, great compassion, great joy, great equanimity, and the eighteen distinctive abilities of a buddha are non-dual, then all of these are neither in union nor not in union, neither having form nor formless, neither visible nor invisible, neither obstructing nor unobstructing, all sharing the same single characteristic, which is to say, the characteristic of absence.

The non-duality of the ten powers of a buddha is not the ten powers of a buddha, and the non-duality of the four forms of fearlessness up to the eighteen distinctive abilities of a buddha is not the four forms of fearlessness up to the eighteen distinctive abilities of a buddha.

Whether it is thusness or non-duality, whether it is the dharma realm, dharma nature, nature of equality, nature of detachment, dharma determination, dharma abode, ultimate reality, space realm, or inconceivable realm, whether it is non-duality, all of these are neither associated nor unassociated, neither having form nor formless, neither visible nor invisible, neither having obstruction nor unobstructed, all having the same single characteristic, which is to say, the characteristic of absence.

Thusness is non-dual, and thusness is not thusness; the dharma realm up to the inconceivable realm is non-dual, and the dharma realm up to the inconceivable realm is not the dharma realm up to the inconceivable realm.

If unsurpassed perfect enlightenment is non-dual, and if the cognition of the path and the cognition of all aspects are non-dual, then all of these are neither conjoined nor disjoined, neither form nor formless, neither visible nor invisible, neither impeded nor unimpeded, and all have the same single mark, which is to say, the mark of the absence of marks.

Unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, if non-dual, is not unsurpassed perfect enlightenment. The cognition of the path and the cognition of all aspects, if non-dual, are not the cognition of the path and the cognition of all aspects.

If the factor of non-forgetfulness is non-dual, and if the nature of constant abiding in equanimity is non-dual, then all of these are neither associated nor not associated, neither having form nor formless, neither visible nor invisible, neither obstructing nor unobstructing, all sharing the same single mark, which is to say, the mark of the absence of marks.

The non-duality of the factor of non-forgetfulness is not the factor of non-forgetfulness, and the non-duality of the nature of constant abiding in equanimity is not the nature of constant abiding in equanimity.
